deal in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to buy and sell a particular type of product
deal in.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: investors dealing in stocks and shares
He then began dealing in heroin.
deal in.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to be interested or involved in something
deal in.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: As a scientist, I do not deal in speculation.
deal in.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to include someone in a game of cards
deal in.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if a person or company deals in a particular type of product, they buy and sell it as their business
deal in.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The shop deals in high-quality antiques.
